name: u r a traveler
description:
first time trying to make a game

less of a game and more just an interactive thingy where you can talk to people and pick up items (and sometimes the items affect what they say to you)

theres no plot! max it will take you 10 mins to play

hope its fun! mute your sound if the song gets too repetitive  sorry tried to make a simple jam for a simple thing

okay love you bye

edit. fixed the chute woops
